channel.title: Uzascape v1
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i194.photobucket.com/albums/z68/xXUzumakiNXx/RyuMOPARFORUMcopy.jpg[/img]
[ul][li]Training Areas[/li] [li]Rare Shops[/li][/ul]
[ul][li]Crazy Monsters[/li] [li]Rare Items[/li][/ul]
[ul][li][b][i]AND MORE![/i][/b][/li][/ul]
[b][i]COMMING SOON![/i][/b]
[ul][li]Godswords[/li] [li]Skill Capes[/li] [li]3rd Age[/li] [li]PKing[/li] [li]QUESTS![/li][/ul]
[b][size=15pt]SHOPS[/size][/b] [b]--Varrock Shops--[/b] Thelessia(Varrock Rares)-onyx necklace, red p.hat, yellow p.hat, blue p.hat, green p.hat, purple p.hat, white p.hat, santa hat, leather gloves, pumpkin,scythe,basket of eggs, easter egg, green h'ween mask, blue h'ween mask, red h'ween mask, holy book(white), unholy book(red), book of balance(green), cape of the legends, cooking gaunlets, goldsmith gaunlets,chaos gaunlets, steel gaunlets, desert boots, zamorak robe(top), zamorak robe(bottom), zammy pl8 armor, legs helm, and sheild. sara, pl8 armor, legs, helm, and shield, guth pl8 armor legs, helm, and shield.
(ok im not gonna type all the shops, thats just a small TASTE of shops, theres also
[ul][li]Varrock-Erkle(rune armor,weps)[/li] [li]Varrock-Robe Store owner(mystics, and tallys)[/li] [li]Varrock-General store(dragon)[/li] [li]Lumby-Bob(random events rares)[/li] [li]Lumby-General Store(armor boots, Toktz, and mime etc.)[/li] [li]Falador-Cassie-(splitbark, ancients, halberds, and granite) [/li] [li]Falador-General Store(White armor, rare weapons)[/li] [li]Falador-Flynn(Obby cape,fire cape, onyx, seercull, mystic mud staff)[/li][/ul]
AND ALOT OF MONSTERS EPESICALLY IN THE TRAINING AREA!
[b][i]ABOUT UZASCAPE[/i][/b] This is a server I had Made and I will be adding more soon. You can't join it at the moment, its under construction. Please note, this is my first server, so please no rude comments. It might not bee [i]l33t[/i] or anything, but its a server! I'm sure when you join it it will be fun. There are a few bugs that need to be fixed but i will do my best to correct them.
[b][size=15pt]PICTURES[/size][/b] [IMG]http://i194.photobucket.com/albums/z68/xXUzumakiNXx/Runescape%20Client/varrockmonsters.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i194.photobucket.com/albums/z68/xXUzumakiNXx/Runescape%20Client/trainingarea.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i194.photobucket.com/albums/z68/xXUzumakiNXx/Runescape%20Client/fallymonsters.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i194.photobucket.com/albums/z68/xXUzumakiNXx/Runescape%20Client/demonarea.jpg[/img]
[b][size=20pt]Thanks for reading![/size][/b]

item.title: Uzascape v1
item.dc:creator: @Uzamiki101 Uzamiki101
item.description:
@Uzamiki101 wrote:

thanks for your opinion, yeah i need to fix it up a little. thats why its not online so people can play on it yet. i also need some moderators.

Read full topic

item.title: Uzascape v1
item.dc:creator: @fvgbak fvgbak
item.description:
@fvgbak wrote:

Looks pretty cool!

A little bit sloppy on the monster placement, but other than that…
it looks like a fun server.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Uzamiki101 wrote:

[ul][li]Training Areas[/li]
[li]Rare Shops[/li][/ul]

[ul][li]AND MORE![/li][/ul]

[li]Skill Capes[/li]
[li]3rd Age[/li]
[li]PKing[/li]
[li]QUESTS![/li][/ul]

[size=15pt]SHOPS[/size]
–Varrock Shops–
Thelessia(Varrock Rares)-onyx necklace, red p.hat, yellow p.hat, blue p.hat, green p.hat, purple p.hat, white p.hat, santa hat, leather gloves, pumpkin,scythe,basket of eggs, easter egg, green h’ween mask, blue h’ween mask, red h’ween mask, holy book(white), unholy book(red), book of balance(green), cape of the legends, cooking gaunlets, goldsmith gaunlets,chaos gaunlets, steel gaunlets, desert boots, zamorak robe(top), zamorak robe(bottom), zammy pl8 armor, legs helm, and sheild. sara, pl8 armor, legs, helm, and shield, guth pl8 armor legs, helm, and shield.

(ok im not gonna type all the shops, thats just a small TASTE of shops, theres also

[ul][li]Varrock-Erkle(rune armor,weps)[/li]
[li]Varrock-Robe Store owner(mystics, and tallys)[/li]
[li]Varrock-General store(dragon)[/li]
[li]Lumby-Bob(random events rares)[/li]
[li]Lumby-General Store(armor boots, Toktz, and mime etc.)[/li]
[li]Falador-Cassie-(splitbark, ancients, halberds, and granite) [/li]
[li]Falador-General Store(White armor, rare weapons)[/li]
[li]Falador-Flynn(Obby cape,fire cape, onyx, seercull, mystic mud staff)[/li][/ul]

AND ALOT OF MONSTERS EPESICALLY IN THE TRAINING AREA!

ABOUT UZASCAPE
This is a server I had Made and I will be adding more soon. You can’t join it at the moment, its under construction. Please note, this is my first server, so please no rude comments. It might not bee l33t or anything, but its a server! I’m sure when you join it it will be fun. There are a few bugs that need to be fixed but i will do my best to correct them.
